alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 2:15PM MST until February 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches across the area through Monday morning, with an additional 1 to 4 inches Monday night into early Tuesday. Amounts of 2 to 5 inches can be expected along the benches both tonight and again Monday night. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County and Northern Wasatch Front. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times, and may impact the morning commutes Monday and Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow will develop this evening and persist into the overnight hours. Precipitation will become showery for a time Monday, before snow becomes widespread and potentially heavy again Monday night into early Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
